summary: Fitness app with Vortex AI chatbot and gym locator feature
architectural_notes: Vortex AI should parse API responses to display clean text only, not raw code
Gym Locator replaced with manual location/zip code entry system (no geolocation/map API)
Remove unnecessary empty fields throughout the application

existing_features.title: Replace the Gym Buddy Locator component with a zip code-based gym search system. Add a backend method to store and retrieve gym locations by zip code or city name. Remove any geolocation or map API dependencies from the frontend component.

Remove all unnecessary or empty form fields throughout the application. Audit all forms in the client dashboard, trainer dashboard, admin dashboard, and profile setup to identify and remove fields that are not being used or are consistently left empty.
Update the VortexMessage component to handle and display parsed AI responses correctly, ensuring proper text formatting without rendering any code syntax or technical artifacts.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix Vortex AI chat to display only clean text responses instead of raw backend code or scripts. Parse the HTTP outcall response from the AI service to extract only the message content and strip any code blocks, technical metadata, or formatting artifacts before displaying to users.
